emails.subject: Project Update Meeting
emails.body: Hi team, Let's meet tomorrow at 10 AM to discuss the project progress. Please prepare your updates.

emails.subject: Welcome to AudioEmailer
emails.body: Welcome to AudioEmailer! We're excited to help you manage your emails through voice. Here's how to get started...

emails.subject: Invoice #12345
emails.body: Your invoice for March 2025 is attached. Total amount due: $150.00. Please process the payment at your earliest convenience.

emails.subject: Draft: Quarterly Report
emails.body: Here's the draft of Q1 2025 report. Please review and provide feedback by Friday.

emails.subject: Re: Client Meeting
emails.body: Thank you for the meeting. I've reviewed the proposal and have some questions about the timeline.
